metadata.title: USN-6019-1 -- Flask-CORS vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Flask-CORS did not properly escape paths before evaluating resource rules. An attacker could possibly use this to expose sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6019-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-flask-cors - 3.0.8-2ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
